entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 06:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
